title: Monitor Well Annulus Pressure
description: An integrity engineer monitors the pressure in the annulus of an offshore well for any signs of a leak or pressure buildup.

tasks.description: Retrieve the last 30 days of pressure readings from the 'A' annulus of well SB-101.
tasks.expected_outcome: A trend chart of the annulus pressure is displayed.

tasks.description: Analyze the trend for any sustained pressure increase, which could indicate a leak.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows a slow but steady pressure increase over the last week.

tasks.description: Flag the well for further investigation and schedule a diagnostic test (e.g., an echo test) to find the leak source.
tasks.expected_outcome: The well is flagged in the integrity management system, and a diagnostic work order is created.
